name: THE GREAT EMPIRE CORPORATION PRESENTS: THE NEW LIFE
name_original: THE GREAT EMPIRE CORPORATION PRESENTS: THE NEW LIFE
description:
One of a collection of text-based interactive fictions I'm creating in Twine for NaNoWriMo. The first in the series of loosely connected stories, it took about 8-10 hours or so to write and edit, has multiple endings and is roughly 10000 words long.

In the IF, you play as someone who's bought a virtual reality device that lets you live in a new world that replaces your old one. In this world, nobody can die or get hurt so that the world can achieve peace and crime can drop. You get to explore this world and try to find out more.

Font in logo by Vivian Vong. Found at: http://www.hipsthetic.com/virus_01-free-glitch-font/
